          <title>
            <string language="en">Torch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fackel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Incendiez</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Torcia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φανός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Antorcha</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the electric circuit inside a torch. A bulb is connected to a switch and a battery of cells.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">torch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den elektrischen Stromkreis 
innerhalb einer Fackel. Eine Birne wird an einen Schalter und 
eine Batterie der Zellen angeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le circuit électrique 
à l'intérieur d'un incendier. Une ampoule est reliée à un 
passage et à une batterie des cellules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o circuito elétrico 
dentro de uma tocha. Um bulbo é conectado a um interruptor e a 
uma bateria das pilhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il circuito elettrico 
all'interno di una torcia. Una lampadina è collegata ad un 
interruttore e ad una batteria delle cellule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ηλεκτρικό κύκλωμα μέσα 
σε έναν φανό. Ένας βολβός συνδέεται με έναν διακόπτη και 
μια μπαταρία των κυττάρων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el circuito eléctrico 
dentro de una antorcha. Un bulbo está conectado con un 
interruptor y una batería de células.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birne</string>
          </keyword>
